feed.title: Dittofeed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.12.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • upgrade docs for v0.12.1 by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/771

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.12.0...v0.12.1

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.13.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • render.yaml improvements by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/778
  • webhook channel types by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/779
  • upgrade remeda by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/780
  • remove deprecated use of remeda mapValues by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/782
  • allow webhooks to render test messages by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/781
  • webhook messaging implementation by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/783
  • export templates script by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/784
  • template publisher with drafts by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/785
  • style publisher by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/787
  • additional subscription tests and logging by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/788
  • default replyTo to undefined if empty by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/789
  • ensure preview is re-rendeered with view draft by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/790
  • don't overwrite template drafts from server state by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/791
  • remove branding feature by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/792
  • ensure template preview expands to full height and width by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/793
  • don't render template if user properties is empty by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/794
  • add performed segment node to segments docs by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/795
  • stabilize events table toolbar reference by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/796
  • remove branding from settings page by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/797
  • better handle numeric ids when generating unsubscribe link by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/798
  • run tests in ci by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/799
  • correct template preview height by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/800
  • webhook templates by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/802
  • webhook secrets by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/803
  • allow webhook subscription groups to be created by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/804
  • admin api key table in settings by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/805
  • expose events api through /admin by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/806
  • correct api schema by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/807

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.12.1...v0.13.0

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.13.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • DF-428 - Making user properties pane collapsible by @ananthu-kurup in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/801
  • remove conditional render circular progress by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/810
  • webhook editor autoselect instead of textfield by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/811
  • document webhooks by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/812

New Contributors

  • @ananthu-kurup made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/801

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.13.0...v0.13.1

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.13.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix type errors in events table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/819

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.13.1...v0.13.2

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.13.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • clickhouse client fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/820
  • more granular postgres connection options by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/821

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.13.2...v0.13.3
